name: Night Mice (prototype 2020)
description:
You're a mouse stuck inside a decaying mansion, and your only objective is to escape!

This is a mini 3-week project I developed during my studies in University back in December 2020. The game is created with fully original art, music, sound, everything implemented into Unity! I wanted to offer it for free! 

Night Mice is a concept that I wish to take further, though this is just a prototype showcasing a bit of the concept. 

The gameplay is short and straight-forward, literally!

Hope you'll enjoy!
